data.actual_result: Starts slowing down and starts glitching
data.expected_result: I can change the volume smoothly with no hassle
data.short_description: When repeatedly turning & offing the volume from the volume bar the bar glitches
data.steps_to_repro: - Get a music bot - Let it play music - Click on its profile, then repeatedly change the volume to down and up (using the soundbar \*\*only\*\*)
